TEXT.S: Namibia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 22 00 S, 17 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 824,292 sq km (maki' tay 34ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 823,290 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 1,002 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 2,436,469. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 47.20 , lhlahuy hya' ga 8.80 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 44 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Windhoek. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 21 na tay cyugal byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Hage Geingob, aring ryax 21 squ byacing tay 3 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
